data.title: Oracle Cerner Careers
data.text:
On June 8, 2022, Oracle completed the acquisition of Cerner.

Learn more about Oracle >

Cerner empowers innovation at the intersection of healthcare and technology.

Your talent can accelerate our progress in changing healthcare around the world. Your ideas can open pathways to life-changing solutions, and your ambitions can have real impact with Cerner, where we believe in developing talent and growing careers from within. Imagine where your abilities can lead us as we work to deliver a better tomorrow for people and populations around the globe.

Healthcare is too important to stay the same.â„¢

Learn More

If you are an individual with a disability who is unable to use our online tools to search and apply for jobs, and need assistance or an accommodation, please contact us by calling 866-434-1543 or by emailing CernerCareers@cerner.com.

Recruiting Fraud Alert: Cerner may be included in a recruiting fraud scam targeting potential job candidates. If you feel you have been involved, read more here.
